completedHtml:
We will send you a slack notification or redirect you to the results page once the scan job has been completed.
Thank you!
DSP APPSEC TEAM

validators.text: Start with an alphabetic character and include only '-' , '_' , numbers and alphabetic characters.

elements.name: results_in_slack
elements.title: Info: Average scan time is about 3 min depending on the resources and APIs enabled on your GCP Project.

choices.text: Do you want to send results to a slack channel?
